GSP31iskamatu:391: āptiḥ sākṣādarthaprāptir yathārthopalambhaḥ tayā vartata ity āptaḥ sākṣātkṛtadharmā yathārthāptyā śrutārthagrāhī tad uktam āptavacanam /
GSP31iskamatu:394: jahallakṣaṇājahallakṣaṇā jahadajahallakṣaṇā cetyādi pramāṇaśāstreṣu bahutaraḥ prapañca āste /
GSP31iskamatu:395: tatra prakrāntam eva tāvad abhidhīyate bhagavataḥ kapilasya matam /
GSP31iskamatu:396: āgamo hy āptavacanam āptaṃ doṣakṣayād viduḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:399: pūjitas tadvidhair nityam āpto jñeyaḥ sa tādṛśaḥ //
GSP31iskamatu:400: tad evam etat trividhaṃ pramāṇam // SkMv_5 //
GSP31iskamatu:402: tad evaṃ vyaktāvyaktajñākhyasya pratyakṣāditrividhapramāṇeṣu kena kasya siddhiḥ syāt iti / atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:403: sāmānyatas tu dṛṣṭād atīndriyāṇāṃ pratītir anumānāt /
GSP31iskamatu:404: tasmād api cāsiddhaṃ parokṣam āptāgamāt sādhyam // ISk_6 //
GSP31iskamatu:405: atra pradhānapuruṣāv atīndriyau tayoḥ sāmānyatodṛṣṭād anumānāt siddhiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:406: yasmān mahadādi liṅgaṃ triguṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāryaṃ tatkāraṇam adṛṣṭam apy asti triguṇaṃ ceti sādhyate pradhānam /
GSP31iskamatu:407: na hy asataḥ sadutpattiḥ syād iti /
GSP31iskamatu:408: na ca kāraṇāsadṛśaṃ kāryaṃ syād iti /
GSP31iskamatu:409: vyaktaṃ tu pratyakṣeṇaiva sādhitam iti tadarthe na prayatnaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:410: yasmāj jaḍam api pradhānaṃ prasūtikriyāyāṃ pravartate tasmād asti lohasya calanakriyāśaktihetucumbakavad avaśyaṃ puruṣa iti jñasiddhiḥ // SkMv_6 //
GSP31iskamatu:412: nanu pratyakṣeṇa yo 'rtho nopalabhyate sa sarvathā nāstīti mataṃ saṅgacchate /
GSP31iskamatu:416: evaṃ pradhānapuruṣau nopalabhyete tasmāt tāv api na sta ity āśaṅkānirāsāyāha ---
GSP31iskamatu:418: saukṣmyād vyavadhānād abhibhavāt samānābhihārāc ca // ISk_7 //
GSP31iskamatu:419: iha loke satām apy arthānām aṣṭadhā nopalabdhiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:420: tathā hi darśayati --- yathā satām api devadattaviṣṇumitrayajñadattānāṃ deśāntaragatānām atidūrān nopalabdhiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:422: yathā vā cakṣur atisāmīpyāt kajjalaṃ nopalabhate /
GSP31iskamatu:426: anavasthitacittau rājānam api yāntaṃ na paśyati /
GSP31iskamatu:432: sūryāditejasābhibhūtānāṃ grahanakṣatratārakādīnām anupalambhāt teṣāṃ kim abhāvaḥ śakyate parikalpayitum /
GSP31iskamatu:433: mudgarāśikuvalayāmalakamauktikakapotādinikurambe kṣiptaṃ samānaṃ yadi nopalabhyate tad avedam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:438: tatra mṛtpiṇḍe ghaṭaḥ prāg utpatter nopalabhyata iti prāgabhāvaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:439: pradhvaṃsābhāvo yathā mudgarābhighātāt pradhvasto ghaṭo nopalabhyate /
GSP31iskamatu:447: evaṃ pradhānapuruṣāv api santau nopalabhyete // SkMv_7 //
GSP31iskamatu:449: tad amīṣāṃ madhye kena hetunemau nopalabhyete / tad ucyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:451: mahadādi tac ca kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ca // ISk_8 //
GSP31iskamatu:452: tasya pradhānasyānupalabdhir anavagamaḥ saukṣmyāt hetor nābhāvāt /
GSP31iskamatu:456: kiṃ tu asti pradhānaṃ nopalabhyate saukṣmyāt paramāṇvādivat /
GSP31iskamatu:460: yathā vaṭadhānyaṃ kāraṇaṃ vaṭaṃ kāryam ālokyānumīyate /
GSP31iskamatu:461: evaṃ sad eva pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ mahadādeḥ sataḥ kāryād anumīyate /
GSP31iskamatu:463: mahadādi mahāna haṅkāraḥ pañcatanmātrāṇi ekādaśendriyāṇi pañca mahābhūtāni ceti trayoviṃśatikam /
GSP31iskamatu:464: etan mahadādi kāryaṃ triguṇaṃ dṛṣṭvānumīyate --- asti pradhānam api triguṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasyedaṃ triguṇaṃ kāryam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:466: tac ca kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ca /
GSP31iskamatu:468: santi te hetavo yair etat pradhānaṃ visadṛśaṃ sadṛśaṃ ca /
GSP31iskamatu:469: yathā loke putraḥ pituḥ sadṛśo visadṛśaḥ syāt yadi rūpeṇa tadā na guṇaiḥ,
GSP31iskamatu:470: yadā guṇais tadā na rūpeṇeti yāvat /
GSP31iskamatu:471: tāṃś ca hetūn upariṣṭād vakṣyāmaḥ // SkMv_8 //
GSP31iskamatu:474: anyat pṛcchāmaḥ --- kim etan mahadādi prāg utpatteḥ pradhāne sat jāyate,
GSP31iskamatu:477: atra vaiśeṣikā vipratipannā asataḥ sad bhavatīti manyante /
GSP31iskamatu:478: mṛtpiṇḍe hi prāg utpatter ghaṭo nāstīti vyavasitāste /
GSP31iskamatu:482: evam anyonyavirodhavādiṣu darśiṣu ko nāma niścayaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:484: tatra tāvat sadasadvādino jīvakāḥ svavacanavirodhenaiva nirastāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:488: atra dṛṣṭānto yathā devadatto mṛto jīvati cetivat /
GSP31iskamatu:489: bauddhānāṃ tu nāsti na ca nāstīti pakṣaparigrahābhāvāt taiḥ saha sañjalpa eva na yujyate /
GSP31iskamatu:490: vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ tu asataḥ sad bhavatīti matapratiṣedhāya ucyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:492: śaktasya śakyakaraṇāt kāraṇabhāvāc ca sat kāryam // ISk_9 //
GSP31iskamatu:493: iha loke sad eva sad bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:500: na cāsti tasmād anumīyate pradhāne prāg utpatter mahadādikam asty eva /
GSP31iskamatu:502: iha loke yo yenārthī sa tadupādānagrahaṇaṃ karoti /
GSP31iskamatu:505: yadi cāsatkāryaṃ syāt tadā dadhyarthī udakasyāpy upādānaṃ kuryāt,
GSP31iskamatu:509: iha loke yad yasmin vidyate tasmād eva tad utpadyate /
GSP31iskamatu:513: sarvataḥ sambhavet tataś ca tṛṇapāṃsuvālukādibhyo rajatasuvarṇamaṇimuktāpravālādayo jāyeran /
GSP31iskamatu:515: tasmāt paśyāmaḥ sarvasambhavābhāvād api mahadādi kāryaṃ pradhāne sad eva sad bhavatīti /
GSP31iskamatu:517: iha loke śaktaḥ śilpī karaṇādikāraṇopādānakālopāyasampannaḥ śakyād eva śakyaṃ karma ārabhate nāśakyam aśakyāt /
GSP31iskamatu:518: tad yathā --- śaktaḥ kumbhakāraḥ śakyād eva mṛtpiṇḍāt śakyadaṇḍacakrasūtrodakavidalatalādibhiḥ sampanno ghaṭaśarāvodañcanādīny ārabhamāṇo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:521: yadi punaḥ karaṇaniyamo na syād aśakyād apy aśakyam ārabhyeta /
GSP31iskamatu:525: iha loke yallakṣaṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ syāt /
GSP31iskamatu:528: yadi cāsatkāryaṃ syāt tadā kodravebhyaḥ śālīnām api niṣpattiḥ syāt /
GSP31iskamatu:530: tasmāt kāraṇabhāvād api paśyāmaḥ pradhāne mahadādi kāryam astīti /
GSP31iskamatu:531: sādhitam evam etaiḥ pañcabhir hetubhiḥ sat kāryam /
GSP31iskamatu:532: “sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyaṃ taddhaika āhur asad evedam agra āsīt” ity ārabhya “sattveva somyedam agra āsīt” [chāndogyopaniṣad 6 / 2 /
GSP31iskamatu:536: tatra yad uktaṃ pūrvasyām āryāyāṃ “prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ca” iti /
GSP31iskamatu:538: hetumad anityam avyāpi sakriyam anekam āśritaṃ liṅgam /
GSP31iskamatu:539: sāvayavaṃ paratantraṃ vyaktaṃ viparītam avyaktam // ISk_10 //
GSP31iskamatu:542: hetur apadeśo nimittaṃ prakṛtiḥ kāraṇam ity anarthāntaram /
GSP31iskamatu:544: tasmāt pradhānena hetunā sakāraṇam idaṃ mahadādibhūtaparyantaṃ trayoviṃśatikaṃ liṅgam /
GSP31iskamatu:545: tathā hi --- mahad buddhitattvaṃ tatpradhānena hetumat /
GSP31iskamatu:547: taiś ca bhūtānīti sarvam evedaṃ parasparahetumat /
GSP31iskamatu:548: atha ca dvividho hetuḥ kārako jñāpakaś ca /
GSP31iskamatu:551: tad dvividhenāpi hetunā yuktaṃ hetumad idaṃ siddham /
GSP31iskamatu:556: tad yathā --- mṛtpiṇḍād utpanno ghaṭaḥ sa cānityo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:558: tasmād anityaṃ tasminn eva ca līyate /
GSP31iskamatu:559: tathā hi --- pradhāne buddhis tasyām ahaṅkāras tasminn indriyāṇi tanmātrāṇi ca teṣu bhūtāni pralayakāle līyante /
GSP31iskamatu:562: yathā pradhānapuruṣau sarvagatau na tathedam ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:563: idaṃ hi yasminn eva pradeśe 'vasthitaṃ tasminn eva vartate /
GSP31iskamatu:565: yasmāt saṃsaraṇakāle mahadādi kāryaṃ sūkṣmaśarīram āśritya saṃsarati tasmāt sakriyam /
GSP31iskamatu:579: yathā pitari jīvati putro na svatantra evaṃ vyaktam /
GSP31iskamatu:600: triguṇam aviveki viṣayaḥ sāmānyam acetana prasavadharmi /
GSP31iskamatu:601: vyaktaṃ tathā pradhānaṃ tadviparītas tathā ca pumān // ISk_11 //
GSP31iskamatu:605: yathā kṛṣṇatantuḥ kāraṇaṃ paṭaḥ kāryam api kṛṣṇam eva bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:606: triguṇena kāryeṇāsya kāraṇam api triguṇaṃ bhavatīti pradhānaṃ sādhyate /
GSP31iskamatu:608: amī guṇā idaṃ vyaktam iti vivektuṃ na pāryate,
GSP31iskamatu:609: tathā pradhānam api idaṃ pradhānaṃ amī guṇā iti na śakyate pṛthak kartum /
GSP31iskamatu:613: tathā pradhānam api sarvapuruṣāṇāṃ kṣetrajñānāṃ bhogyam /
GSP31iskamatu:621: buddher ahaṅkāras tata indriyāṇi tanmātrāṇi ca tebhyo bhūtāni jāyante /
GSP31iskamatu:624: idānīṃ “tadviparītas tathā ca pumān” ity uktaṃ,
GSP31iskamatu:627: tayor yat sādharmyaṃ “triguṇam aviveki viṣayaḥ sāmānyam acetanaṃ prasavadharmi” ity uktam /
GSP31iskamatu:632: vaidharmyam abhidhāya sādharmyam āha --- tathā ca pumān iti /
GSP31iskamatu:633: “hetumad anityam avyāpi sakriyam anekam āśritaṃ liṅgam /
GSP31iskamatu:636: tad yathā vyaktād visadṛśaṃ pradhānaṃ tathā pradhānasadharmā puruṣaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:637: tathā hi ahetumān nityo vyāpī niṣkriya eko 'nāśrito 'liṅgo niravayavaḥ svatantra iti // SkMv_11 //
GSP31iskamatu:639: tatra triguṇa vyaktam avyaktaṃ ca nirguṇaḥ puruṣa ity uktam /
GSP31iskamatu:644: prītiś cāprītiś ca viṣādaś ca te ātmā svarūpaṃ yeṣāṃ guṇānāṃ te bhavanti prītyaprītiviṣādātmakāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:649: yo hi kaścit kvacit prītiṃ labhate tatra ārjavamārdavasatyaśaucahrībuddhikṣamānukampājñānādi ca tat sattvaṃ pratyetavyam /
GSP31iskamatu:652: yo hi kaścit kadācit kvacid aprītim upalabhate tatra dveṣadrohamatsaranindāstambhotkaṇṭhānikṛtivañcanābandhavadhacchedanāni ca tad rajaḥ pratyetavyam /
GSP31iskamatu:655: yo hi kaścit kadācit kvacin moham upalabhate,
GSP31iskamatu:658: prakāśaś ca pravṛttiś ca niyamaś ca te arthā yeṣāṃ tathoktāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:664: anyonyābhibhavāś ca anyonyāśrayāś ca anyonyajananāś ca anyonyamithunāś ca yeṣāṃ guṇānām anyonyavṛttayaś ca vidyante tathoktāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:667: anyonyābhibhavāś ceti rajastamasor abhibhavāt śāntā vṛttir utpadyate sattvasya dharmādyā /
GSP31iskamatu:668: sattvatamasor abhibhavād rajaso ghorā vṛttir utpadyate adharmādyā /
GSP31iskamatu:669: sattvarajasor abhibhavāt tamaso mūḍhā vṛttir utpadyate ajñānādyā /
GSP31iskamatu:679: yathā saparikarakumbhakārādhiṣṭhito mṛtpiṇḍo ghaṭaṃ janayati tadvaj janayanti /
GSP31iskamatu:682: evaṃ buddhisthā guṇāḥ sattvarajastamāṃsi parasparaṃ bodhayanti /
GSP31iskamatu:692: yathā kācit strī nayavinayavilāsalīlāvatī bhartur ātmano bandhuvargasya ca prītiṃ janayati /
GSP31iskamatu:694: evaṃ sattvena strībhūtena rajasas tamasaś ca vṛttir janitā /
GSP31iskamatu:701: iha khalu rūpayauvanadākṣiṇyamatisādhutvasmṛtyugrabhāvābhāvalīlāvilāsasampannā strī sattvasya rūpam upadiśyate /
GSP31iskamatu:704: tathā kṣatriyā duḥkhapraharaṇakṛtāparādhāṃ dasyusenām abhinighnatī rajaso rūpam ity upadiśyate /
GSP31iskamatu:705: tena ca dasyubhir upadrutānāṃ dāryamāṇānāṃ sukhāvahā bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:707: tathā ghanāghano mahākṛṣṇo meghas toyādhmāto 'valambī grasamāna iva nabho bhūmiṃ cābhivardhamānaḥ sabalākaḥ savidyudgambhīrastanitas tamaso rūpam ity upadiśyate /
GSP31iskamatu:708: sa ca karṣakāṇāṃ sajjīkṛtabījopakaraṇānāṃ sukho bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:709: sa evānācchāditaśaraṇānām anupārjitabhaktasnehalavaṇānām apraguṇitatṛṇakāṣṭhānāṃ proṣitavadhūnāṃ ca duḥkho mūḍhaś ca /
GSP31iskamatu:714: sattvaṃ laghu prakāśakam iṣṭam upaṣṭambhakaṃ calaṃ ca rajaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:715: guru varaṇakam eva tamaḥ pradīpavac cārthato vṛttiḥ // ISk_13 //
GSP31iskamatu:716: atra yat pūrvasyām āryāyām abhihitaṃ sattvalakṣaṇaṃ tal laghutvaprakāśakalakṣaṇaṃ ca /
GSP31iskamatu:717: yadā sattvam utkaṭaṃ bhavati devadatte tadā laghūny aṅgāni,
GSP31iskamatu:719: tadā mantavyam adya me sattvam utkaṭatvena vartate /
GSP31iskamatu:723: yathā mattavṛṣo vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā uddhato bhavati tadvat /
GSP31iskamatu:725: evaṃ yasmin devadatte yajñadatte vā raja utkaṭaṃ bhavati sa kalahaṃ mṛgayate /
GSP31iskamatu:726: kiṃ cānyat calacittaś ca bhavati grāmaṃ gacchāmi striyaṃ kāmaye tapaḥ karomi ityādi /
GSP31iskamatu:729: tama āha --- guru varaṇakam eva tamaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:730: yad gurutvam āvaraṇatvaṃ cāsti tat tamaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:733: tadānīṃ mantavyam etat tama utkaṭatvena vartata iti /
GSP31iskamatu:735: yat punar abhyadhāyi --- strī kṣatriyā meghaś ceti /
GSP31iskamatu:737: sattvaṃ rajastamasī āśritya svena rūpeṇāṅgāṅgibhāvaṃ gacchati /
GSP31iskamatu:740: parasparaviruddhānāṃ guṇānāṃ katham ekā vṛttir bhavatīty atrāha --- parasparaviruddhāḥ(p.17)
GSP31iskamatu:741: śatravo na hy ekam arthaṃ kurvanti /
GSP31iskamatu:742: ime ca guṇāḥ parasparaviruddhā api puruṣārthaṃ kurvanti /
GSP31iskamatu:748_0: yathā tailāgnivarttikāsaṃyogāt parasparaviruddhā api padārthāḥ saṃhatya ekam arthaṃ
GSP31iskamatu:748_1: prakāśarūpaṃ niṣpādayanty evaṃ guṇā api parasparaviruddhāḥ saṃhatya puruṣārthaṃ kurvanti // SkMv_13 //
GSP31iskamatu:750: yad uktaṃ pūrvasyām āryāyāṃ “triguṇam aviveki viṣayaḥ sāmānyam acetanaṃ prasavadharmi /
GSP31iskamatu:751: vyaktam --- “tat katham evaṃ jñāyate 'vyaktam api triguṇatvādiyuktam / atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:755: yo 'py ayam avivekyādir gaṇaḥ prasavadharmyantaḥ sa vyakte 'pi siddho 'vyakte 'pi siddhaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:763: tasmād avivekyādir guṇas traiguṇyād eva siddhaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:765: iha hi yatra tantavas tatraiva paṭaḥ yatra paṭas tatraiva tantavaḥ,
GSP31iskamatu:766: yas tantūn paśyati sa paṭaṃ paśyati,
GSP31iskamatu:767: yo vā paṭaṃ paśyati sa tantūn paśyati /
GSP31iskamatu:768: evam eva tantupaṭayor iva vyaktāvyaktayoḥ sambandhaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:770: yo hi vyaktaṃ paśyati sa cāvyaktam api paśyati /
GSP31iskamatu:771: yo vā yogī pradhānaṃ paśyati sa vyaktam api paśyati /
GSP31iskamatu:775: kāraṇasya guṇāḥ kāraṇaguṇās te ātmā svabhāvo yasya tadbhāvaḥ kāraṇaguṇātmakatvam /
GSP31iskamatu:778: iha loke yadātmakaṃ karaṇaṃ tadātmakam eva kāryam api bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:780: yathā kaṭunimbavṛkṣāt kaṭur eva raso bhavati madhurāc ca madhuro drākṣādirasaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:783: katham evaṃ jñāyate avyaktam avivekyādigaṇena yuktam iti tad evam eva tribhir hetubhiḥ pratipāditam /
GSP31iskamatu:784: atrāha --- iha loke yan na vidyate tan nāsti /
GSP31iskamatu:790: tau kathaṃ hi sta iti gamyate /
GSP31iskamatu:793: evaṃ pradhānapuruṣāv anupalabhyamānāv apy upalabhyete hetubhiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:794: tāṃś ca hetūn upariṣṭād vakṣyāmaḥ // SkMv_14 //
GSP31iskamatu:797: bhedānāṃ parimāṇāt samanvayāc chaktitaḥ pravṛtteś ca /
GSP31iskamatu:801: loke yatra kartāsti tasya parimāṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP31iskamatu:802: yathā kulālaḥ parimitāt mṛtpiṇḍāt parimitam eva ghaṭaṃ kurute prasthagrāhakam āḍhakagrāhakaṃ vā /
GSP31iskamatu:804: ekā buddhir eko 'haṅkāraḥ pañca tanmātrāṇi ekādaśendriyāṇi pañca mahābhūtāni iti trayoviṃśatikam /
GSP31iskamatu:805: evam etat parimitaṃ vyaktaṃ dṛṣṭvānumānena sādhayāmo 'sty asya kāraṇaṃ pradhānaṃ yad vyaktaṃ parimitam utpādayati /
GSP31iskamatu:806: yadi ca pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ na syān niṣparimāṇam idaṃ vyaktaṃ syāt /
GSP31iskamatu:807: asti cāsya parimāṇaṃ tasmād asti pradhānam /
GSP31iskamatu:815: tasmāt samanvayadarśanāt paśyāmo 'sti pradhānaṃ kāraṇam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:817: iha yo yasminn arthe śaktaḥ sa tasminn eva pravartate /
GSP31iskamatu:819: ataḥ sādhayāmaḥ pradhānasyāpy asti śaktir yayā śaktyā vyaktam utpādayati /
GSP31iskamatu:820: sā ca śaktir nirāśrayā na bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:821: tasmād asti pradhānaṃ yatra śaktir avatiṣṭhate /
GSP31iskamatu:826: tad yathā mṛtpiṇḍaḥ kāraṇaṃ ghaṭaḥ kāryam /
GSP31iskamatu:827: sa eva(p.19) hi madhūdakapayaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ dhāraṇe samartho na tu mṛtpiṇḍaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:831: anyac ca avyaktaṃ pradhānaṃ viparītaṃ kāraṇam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:844: prakarṣeṇa dhīyate sthāpyate atrākhilam iti pradhānam /
GSP31iskamatu:846: na hy asata utpattir na ca sato 'bhāvaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:848: iti gītāsu(2 /16) / “sad eva somyedam agra āsīt“[chāndogyopaniṣad 6 / 2 /
GSP31iskamatu:851: tad yathā --- dadhyādayaḥ prāk prasūteḥ kṣīre 'vibhaktāḥ santy eva /
GSP31iskamatu:852: yady asata utpattis tadā kāṣṭhakhaṇḍād api ghaṭādyutpattiḥ syāt /
GSP31iskamatu:854: tasmān mṛtpiṇḍe kāraṇe ghaṭādeḥ sata evotpattir iti samīcīnam /
GSP31iskamatu:855: yathā jalabhūmyor etadrasagandhādivaiśvarūpyam avibhaktam asty eva sthāvarāṇāṃ jaṅgameṣu jaṅgamānāṃ sthāvareṣu /
GSP31iskamatu:856: evaṃ jātyanucchedena sarvaṃ sarvātmakam iti // SkMv_15 //
GSP31iskamatu:858: asti pradhānaṃ yatra mahadādiliṅgam avibhāgaṃ gacchati /
GSP31iskamatu:859: ity evam avaśyambhāvī avibhāgaḥ paścād vibhāgaś cāvirbhavati tat pradhānam / atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:860: kāraṇam asty avyaktaṃ pravartate triguṇataḥ samudayāc ca /
GSP31iskamatu:863: tad evaṃ pañcabhir ebhir hetubhir jñāyate 'sti tatkāraṇam ekam asya jagato 'vyaktaṃ mūlam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:864: atrāha yady ekaṃ pradhānaṃ kathaṃ tarhi anekaṃ kāryam utpādayati /
GSP31iskamatu:865: tathā hi naikas tantuḥ paṭākhyaṃ kāryaṃ janayati /
GSP31iskamatu:866: itthaṃ pradhānam ekam anekaṃ kāryaṃ janayatīti na jāghaṭīti /
GSP31iskamatu:871: yathā gaṅgāyāṃ srotāṃsi samuditāni gaṅgām ārabhante,
GSP31iskamatu:872: yathā vā tantavaḥ samuditāḥ paṭaṃ kurvanti evaṃ sattvarajastamāṃsi trayo guṇāḥ samuditāḥ pradhānasthā vyaktaṃ kurvanti /
GSP31iskamatu:873: atrāha --- iha loke dvividhaṃ kāraṇaṃ pariṇāmakatvād(p.20)
GSP31iskamatu:877: tatra pradhānaṃ kathaṃ kāraṇam ity atrocyate --- pariṇāmataḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:879: yad eva kṣīraṃ tad eva dadhi,
GSP31iskamatu:881: dadhivad vyaktaṃ kṣīravat pradhānam ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:882: yad evāvyaktaṃ tad eva vyaktam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:883: tasmād ucyate pariṇāmataḥ pradhānaṃ kāraṇam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:886: yathā salilam ekaṃ himavad himabhāvena pariṇamati,
GSP31iskamatu:891: atrāha --- ekasmāt pradhānād utpannās trayo lokāḥ kathaṃ viṣamāḥ?
GSP31iskamatu:892: iha ye devās te sukhino manuṣyās te duḥkhinas tiryañco mūḍhāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:893: ekasmāt pradhānād utpannānāṃ trayāṇāṃ lokānāṃ kathaṃ vaiṣamyaṃ mūḍhatvādinety atrocyate --- pratipratiguṇāśrayaviśeṣāt /
GSP31iskamatu:894: tad yathā --- ekarasam antarikṣād jalaṃ patitam /
GSP31iskamatu:895: tac ca medinīṃ prāpya nānārasatāṃ yāti /
GSP31iskamatu:897: evam ime trayo lokā ekasmād api pradhānād utpannā guṇavaiṣamyāt pṛthagbhāvaṃ gatāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:898: yathā deveṣu sattvam utkaṭaṃ tatas te sukhinaḥ,
GSP31iskamatu:900: manuṣyeṣu raja utkaṭaṃ tatas te duḥkhitāḥ,
GSP31iskamatu:902: tiryagyonigateṣu tama utkaṭaṃ tatas te mūḍhāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:904: evam ekasmād utpannānāṃ trayāṇāṃ lokānāṃ vaiṣamyaṃ bhavati // SkMv_16 //
GSP31iskamatu:908: atrāha --- kecid ācāryā iti manyante śarīrendriyabuddhyādivyatirikto nāsti paramātmā / api ca ---
GSP31iskamatu:918: evaṃ śarīrendriyabuddhyādibhiḥ kṣīranīravad ekībhūto 'pi tadvyatirikto 'sti paramātmā puruṣo 'pi /
GSP31iskamatu:919: pradhānavat sūkṣmatvān nopalabhyate iti tadadhigamāya hetur abhidhīyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:926: iha loke ye saṅghātās te parārthā dṛṣṭāḥ paryaṅkarathaśaraṇādayaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:927: evaṃ gātrāṇāṃ mahadādīnāṃ saṅghātaḥ samudāyaḥ parārtha eva /
GSP31iskamatu:928: (tasmād asti nūnam anyonyādhiṣṭhito yadartho 'yaṃ saṅghāta iti saṅgatiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:931: na hi te rathagṛhaparyaṅkādayaḥ kim api svārthaṃ sādhayanti /
GSP31iskamatu:933: kiṃ tv asty asau devadattādir yo 'smin paryaṅke śete rathena gacchati gṛhe nivasatīti /
GSP31iskamatu:935: evam amī mahadādayaś cakṣurādayo na svārthā na ca parasparārthāḥ,
GSP31iskamatu:941: trayo guṇā yasya gaṇasyādau sambhavanti sa triguṇādiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:944: uktaṃ pūrvasyām āryāyāṃ triguṇam avivekītyādi vyaktapradhānasādharmyam /
GSP31iskamatu:950: tad yatheha loke laṅghanaplavanadhāvanasamarthair aśvair yukto rathaḥ sārathinādhiṣṭhitaḥ pravartate /
GSP31iskamatu:951: atha sārathinānadhiṣṭhitaḥ pravartate tataḥ śarīranāśaḥ syāt /
GSP31iskamatu:953: api coktaṃ ṣaṣṭitantre --- “puruṣādhiṣṭhitaṃ pradhānaṃ pravartate” iti /
GSP31iskamatu:954: tataḥ paśyāmo 'sau paramātmā asti puruṣo yenādhiṣṭhitaṃ pradhānaṃ mahadahaṅkāratanmātrendriyabhūtāny utpādayati /
GSP31iskamatu:958: etaiḥ ṣaḍbhī rasair yuktaṃ bhojanaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhoktā sādhyate /
GSP31iskamatu:960: evam idaṃ vyaktāvyaktaṃ dṛṣṭvā sādhayāmo 'sty asau paramātmā puruṣo yasyedaṃ bhoktur vyaktāvyaktaṃ bhogyam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:963: yā tasya pradhānasya pravṛttiḥ sā kaivalyārthā pravṛttiḥ pradhānasyeti // SkMv_17 //
GSP31iskamatu:966: atrāha --- gṛhṇīmas tāvad ebhiḥ pañcabhir adhītair hetubhiḥ śarīravyatirikto 'sau puruṣo 'stīti /
GSP31iskamatu:967: sa kiṃ sarvaśarīreṣv ekaḥ puruṣa āhosvit pratiśarīraṃ bhinnaḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP31iskamatu:968: kutaḥ saṃśaya iti cec codaka ācāryavipratipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:969: iha kecid ācāryā bhedavādina iti manyante --- eko 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ sarvaśarīreṣūpalabhyate maṇisūtravat /
GSP31iskamatu:970: iha rasanāyāṃ yāvanto maṇayas teṣu sarveṣv ekam eva sūtraṃ pravartate /
GSP31iskamatu:971: evaṃ maṇibhūteṣu śarīreṣu kim ekaḥ sūtrabhūtaḥ paramātmā /
GSP31iskamatu:972: āhosvij jalacandravat puruṣa iti eka eva bahuṣu nadīkūpataḍāgādiṣv ivopalabhyate iti /
GSP31iskamatu:973: ataḥ saṃśayaḥ kim ekaḥ puruṣo guṇasūtranyāyena āhosvid bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:974: atrocyate --- bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ katham iti cet tad ucyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:981: yadi punar ekaḥ puruṣaḥ syāt sa eva nīcakulotpannaḥ syāt sa eva utkṛṣṭakulotpannaḥ syāt /
GSP31iskamatu:987: maraṇe 'pi niyamo dṛṣṭo mama bhrātā mṛto mama pitā ca /
GSP31iskamatu:990: iha kaścit kadācin mriyate tadaiva paro jāyate /
GSP31iskamatu:991: yady ekaḥ puruṣaḥ syāt tarhi ekasmin jāyamāne sarve 'pi jāyeran /
GSP31iskamatu:1001: ataḥ paśyāmo ya upahatendriyās te anye,
GSP31iskamatu:1003: tasmāt pratiniyatakaraṇatvād api paśyāmo 'neke puruṣā iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1009: ihaikasya brāhmaṇasya trayaḥ putrāḥ sabrahmacāriṇa ekenaiva ekasyāṃ bhāryāyāṃ jātāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1013: yady eke ātmā syād ekasmin sāttvike rājase tāmase vā sarve tathā syuḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1017: kiṃ khalu kartā puruṣo 'sty āhosvid akarteti /
GSP31iskamatu:1020: loke tāvat puruṣo gacchati dhāvati tiṣṭhati śocati,
GSP31iskamatu:1023: vaiśeṣikā api kartā iti mataṃ pratipannāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1028: tasmāc ca viparyāsāt siddhaṃ sākṣitvam asya puruṣasya /
GSP31iskamatu:1029: kaivalyaṃ mādhyasthyaṃ draṣṭṛtvam akartṛbhāvaś ca // ISk_19 //
GSP31iskamatu:1032: tad yathā kaścid yamaniyamarataḥ sāṅkhyayogācāryarato bhikṣur nagare prativasati /
GSP31iskamatu:1033: sa ca janādiṣu prativarṇāśramavihitāsu kriyāsu pravartamānānāṃ tannagaravāsināṃ sākṣimātro bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:1035: tadvad ayaṃ nānāvasthe guṇavimarde vartamāno vaidharmyāt kṣetrajñaḥ sākṣimātraḥ syāt /
GSP31iskamatu:1038: yathāsau bhikṣuḥ kadācin nāgarāṇāṃ vivadatāṃ vaktā bhavati tvayā sādhukṛtam iti tvayāsādhv iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1043: atrāha --- yady akartā tat kiṃ parakṛtānāṃ prayoktā /
GSP31iskamatu:1046: atrodāsīnasya puruṣasya kartṛtvaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ guṇalakṣaṇena // SkMv_19 //
GSP31iskamatu:1048: atrāha --- yady akartā puruṣaḥ adhyavasāyaṃ tarhi kiṃ karoti dharmaṃ kariṣyāmy adharmaṃ ceti /
GSP31iskamatu:1049: yadi guṇā adhyavasāyaṃ kurvanti tarhi teṣāṃ sacetanatvaṃ(p.24) syāt /
GSP31iskamatu:1051: atha puruṣo 'dhyavasāyaṃ kurute tadā tasya kartṛtvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1055: tasmāt tatsaṃyogād acetanaṃ cetanāvad iva liṅgam /
GSP31iskamatu:1056: guṇakartṛtve 'pi tathā karteva bhavaty udāsīnaḥ // ISk_20 //
GSP31iskamatu:1058: tasmāt tatsaṃyogād acetanaṃ mahadādi liṅgam adhyavasāyābhimānasaṅkalpālocanādiṣu vṛttiṣu cetanāvat pravartate /
GSP31iskamatu:1059: ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ --- tad yathā anuṣṇāśīto ghaṭaḥ śītābhir adbhiḥ saṃspṛṣṭaḥ śīto bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:1061: evaṃ mahadādi liṅgam acetanam api bhūtvā cetanāvad bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:1063: yad apy uktam --- lokopacārāt kartā puruṣa iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1064: atra brūmaḥ --- guṇakartṛtve 'pi tathā karteva bhavaty udāsīnaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1066: kecit kila caurā grāmaṃ hṛtvā dravyaṃ gṛhītvā grāmāntaraṃ gacchanti kṛtakāryāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1067: taiḥ saha sārthena śrotriyo brāhmaṇaḥ panthānaṃ gacchati /
GSP31iskamatu:1069: kṛtāparādhais taiḥ saha so 'pi brāhmaṇo gṛhītas tvam api caura iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1070: tad yathāsāv acauras tatsaṃsargadoṣeṇa cauratayā pratītas taiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1071: tathā sattvādayo guṇāḥ kartāras taiḥ saṃyuktaḥ puruṣo 'pi akartāpi kartā bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:1075: atrāha --- tasmāt tatsaṃyogāt iti pradhānapuruṣasaṃyoga iti cet,
GSP31iskamatu:1079: sampātajo dvayor vā saṃyogo yathā dvyaṅgulākāśayoḥ,
GSP31iskamatu:1084: atrocyate --- anyatarakarmajasaṃyogaś ca saṃyogo naiva pradhānapuruṣayor vibhutvāniṣkriyatvāt /
GSP31iskamatu:1088: atrāha --- kas tarhi pradhānapuruṣayoḥ saṃyoga iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1093: paṅgvandhavad ubhayor api saṃyogas tatkṛtaḥ sargaḥ // ISk_21 //
GSP31iskamatu:1095: puruṣaḥ pradhānena saha saṃyujyate suguṇāṃ prakṛtiṃ drakṣyāmy ayam arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1097: asya tapasvinaḥ puruṣasya jñāne vartamānasya kaivalyaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
GSP31iskamatu:1099: yathā rājā puruṣeṇa saṃyujyate praiṣaṇaṃ me kariṣyatīti /
GSP31iskamatu:1100: puruṣo 'pi rājñā saṃyujyate vṛttiṃ me dāsyatīti /
GSP31iskamatu:1102: tathā pradhānapuruṣayor apy arthahetukaḥ sambandhaḥ saṃyogaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1106: yathā kila kaścid andhaḥ sārthena samaṃ pāṭaliputraṃ prasthitaḥ sa ca sārthaś caurair abhihataḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1108: sa ca sarvasvajanavirahita itaś cetaś ca paribhrāmyan panthānam apaśyan samantāc caṅkramamāṇaḥ kenacid vanamadhyasthena paṅgunā dṛṣṭaḥ proktaś ca /
GSP31iskamatu:1109: bho bho andha mā bhaiṣīr ahaṃ paṅgur mārgadarśane kuśalī gantum asamarthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1110: andhena prativacanaṃ proktam --- bhoḥ paṅgo yathā bhavān gamanāśaktas tathāham api na śaknomi draṣṭuṃ,
GSP31iskamatu:1112: tava darśanasāmarthyenāhaṃ bhavantaṃ skandhenādāya gacchāmy evam ubhayor duḥkhaparihāralakṣaṇā kāryasiddhir astu /
GSP31iskamatu:1113: evaṃ tayor yathā svārthalabdhihetukaḥ sambandhaḥ saṃyogas tulyaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1120: evaṃ pradhānam api puruṣasya mokṣaṃ kṛtvā nivartate /
GSP31iskamatu:1130: prakṛter mahāṃs tato 'haṅkāras tasmād gaṇaś ca ṣoḍaśakaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1131: tasmād api ṣoḍaśakāt pañcabhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni // ISk_22 //
GSP31iskamatu:1135: tasyāḥ prakṛter mahān utpadyate prathamaḥ kaścit /
GSP31iskamatu:1147: tasya ime paryāyāḥ --- vaikṛtas taijaso bhūtādir abhimāno 'smitā iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1148_0: catuḥṣaṣṭivarṇaiḥ parādivaikharīparyantābhidheyair yat kim apy abhidhīyate buddhyā
GSP31iskamatu:1158: tasmād api ṣoḍaśakāt madhye yāni pañca śabdāditanmātrāṇi tebhyaḥ pañca bhūtāny ākāśādīni /
GSP31iskamatu:1163: gandhatanmātrāt pṛthivī ityādikrameṇa pūrvapūrvānupraveśenaikadvitricatuṣpañcaguṇāny ākāśādipṛthvīparyantāni mahābhūtānīti sṛṣṭikramaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1164: ata eva bhūtānām utpattilayāvabodhanāt bha iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1173: vetti vidyām avidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavān iti” //
GSP31iskamatu:1178: tatra mahadādibhūtaparyantam ity etad vyaktaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP31iskamatu:1180: ityādibhiḥ pañcabhir hetubhir vyākhyātam / yad uktam ---
GSP31iskamatu:1182: jaṭī muṇḍī śikhī vāpi mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ” // SkMv_22 //
GSP31iskamatu:1185: tasya mahataḥ kiṃ lakṣaṇam ity atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:1186: adhyavasāyo buddhir dharmo jñānaṃ virāga aiśvaryam /
GSP31iskamatu:1187: sāttvikam etad rūpaṃ tāmasam asmād viparyastam // ISk_23 //
GSP31iskamatu:1189: adhyavasāyo niścayaḥ pratipattiḥ ayaṃ sthāṇur ayaṃ puruṣa iti buddher lakṣaṇam /
GSP31iskamatu:1192: tatra buddheḥ sāttvikaṃ rūpaṃ caturvidhaṃ bhavati dharmo jñānaṃ vairāgyam aiśvaryam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1193: tatra dharmo nāma varṇinām āśramiṇāṃ ca samayāvirodhena yaḥ prokto yamaniyamalakṣaṇaḥ sa dharmaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1199: ebhir yamaniyamair yaḥ sādhyate sa dharmaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1200: dhāraṇārtho dhṛñ ity eṣa dhātuḥ śābdaiḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1202: tatra yā sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ bhūtānāṃ vāṅmanaḥkāyakarmabhir adrohatā sā ahiṃsā /
GSP31iskamatu:1203_0: tathā yad bhūtahitam atyantaṃ dṛṣṭaśrutānumitivijñāteṣv artheṣu yathāntaḥkaraṇapratyayopasthitaṃ
GSP31iskamatu:1204: tathā yat sambhrameṣv anyeṣu vātyantikeṣu prayojaneṣu sve sve sthāne samatvād grahaṇasyoparamas tad asteyam /
GSP31iskamatu:1205: tathā strīpuruṣasaṃyoge parasparaliṅgasaṃyoge śabdasparśarasarūpagandheṣu yaḥ saṅgavyudāsaḥ śrotādyuparatiḥ asaṅkalpaś ca manasa uparatiḥ so 'ṣṭāṅgaṃ brahmacaryam /
GSP31iskamatu:1208: brahmabījaṃ retas tac carati na muñcatīti brahmacārī /
GSP31iskamatu:1209: brahma vedaṃ vā guruṇā pradattaṃ caratīti /
GSP31iskamatu:1210: brahmā svayambhūs tasyāyaṃ daṇḍakamaṇḍaludhāraṇādirūpa ākāro brahmavac caratīti vā /
GSP31iskamatu:1211: evam arjanakrayavikrayādikalpanābhedānām anupādānaṃ sarvathā sarvasyāsvīkaraṇam aparigrahaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1213: yaś cendriyāṇām antaḥkaraṇoparamas tac chaucaṃ bāhyaṃ mṛjjalādinā /
GSP31iskamatu:1215: svadharme ca vyavasthānaṃ śaucam etat prakīrtitam” //
GSP31iskamatu:1218: ahany ahani yajñaśeṣāśanārtham etad āhāralāghavaṃ santoṣaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1219: “sa yāṃ prathamām āhutiṃ juhuyāt prāṇāya svāhā“(chāndogyopaniṣad 5 / 19 /
GSP31iskamatu:1221: 1) ity ārabhya “sa ya idam avidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti yathāṅgārān apohya bhasmani hutaṃ(juhuyāt?)
GSP31iskamatu:1230: anādivāsanāvicitrā pratyupasthitaviṣayajālā cāśuddhir nāntareṇa tapaḥ sambhedam āpadyata iti tapasa upādānam /
GSP31iskamatu:1231: tac ca cittaprasādanam abādhamānam āsevyam iti manyante /
GSP31iskamatu:1233: īśvarapraṇidhānaṃ kriyāṇāṃ paramagurāv arpaṇaṃ tatphalasaṃnyāso vā /
GSP31iskamatu:1237: ity amīṣāṃ yamaniyamādīnāṃ sevanāt “ahiṃsāpratiṣṭhāyāṃ tatsannidhau vairatyāgaḥ“(pātañjalayogasūtra 2 /
GSP31iskamatu:1240: 33), “vitarkā hiṃsādayaḥ kṛtakāritānumoditā lobhakrodhamohapūrvakā duḥkhājñānānantaphalā iti pratipakṣabhāvanam“(pātañjalayogasūtra 2 /
GSP31iskamatu:1241: 34)(p.29) evaṃ ca vartamānasya yoginaḥ “sthānyupanimantraṇe saṅgasmayākaraṇaṃ punar aniṣṭaprasaṅgāt“(pātañjalayogasūtra 3 /
GSP31iskamatu:1243: ebhir yamaniyamair vā sādhyate sa dharmo vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1248: anye guṇāḥ sattvarajastamāṃsi anyaḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1249: bāhyena jñānena lokopapattir ābhyantareṇa mokṣa iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1251: vairāgyam āha --- arjanarakṣaṇakṣayātṛptihiṃsādidoṣān dṛṣṭvā yo viṣayebhyo viraktas tasya mokṣo nāstīti /
GSP31iskamatu:1252: ābhyantareṇa jñānapūrvakeṇa vairāgyeṇa mokṣo bhavati bāhyena saṃsāra iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1254: aṇimā laghimā garimā mahimā prāptiḥ prākāmyam īśitvaṃ vaśitvaṃ yatrakāmāvasāyitvam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1256: yadā sattvena rajastamasī abhibhūte stas tadā sattvodriktaḥ pumān etān guṇān āpnoti /
GSP31iskamatu:1259: asmāt sāttvikād dharmāder viparyastaṃ viparītam adharmājñānādyaṃ caturdhā buddhe rūpaṃ tāmasam /
GSP31iskamatu:1262: tathā adharmo 'jñānam avairāgyam anaiśvaryam ity aṣṭadhā sāttvikatāmasabhedā buddhiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1263: asyā evam vidhāyā buddher ahaṅkāro jāyate // SkMv_23 //
GSP31iskamatu:1265: idānīm ahaṅkārasya lakṣaṇaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ / tad ucyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:1270: rūpe aham rase aham gandhe aham,
GSP31iskamatu:1273: tasmāt abhimānalakṣaṇād ahaṅkārād dvividhaḥ pravartate sargaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1286: bhūtādes tanmātraḥ sa tāmasas taijasād ubhayam // ISk_25 //
GSP31iskamatu:1288: yadā sattvam utkaṭaṃ bhavati ahaṅkāre tena ca sattvena rajastamasī abhibhūte syātāṃ tadā sāttviko 'haṅkāra ucyate /
GSP31iskamatu:1289: tasya sāttvikasya vaikṛtika iti pūrvācāryaiḥ saṃjñā kṛtā /
GSP31iskamatu:1290: sa vaikṛtiko bhūtvā ahaṅkāra ekādaśendriyāṇi utpādayati /
GSP31iskamatu:1292: tasmād ucyate --- “sāttvika ekādaśakaḥ pravartate vaikṛtād ahaṅkārāt” iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1294: bhūtādes tamobāhulyād gauṇībhūtasattvarajaso bhūtādināmnaḥ pūrvācāryair nirūpitād ahaṅkārāt tanmātraḥ śabdādipañcako gaṇo jāyate /
GSP31iskamatu:1295: abhibhūtasattvatamaso rājasāt taijasābhidhānād ahaṅkārāt pravṛttikarmaṇa ubhayaṃ prakāśātmakam ekādaśendriyakaṃ mohātmakaṃ tanmātrikaṃ cāsīd iti sambandhaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1297: sattvaṃ niṣkriyam ekāki na śaknoty utpādayitum /
GSP31iskamatu:1298: tamaś ca mūḍhatvād akriyam asamarthaṃ vinā rajaḥ sṛṣṭim utpādayitum /
GSP31iskamatu:1299: ata ubhe sattvatamasī sṛṣṭiviṣaye rajasānugṛhīte aindriyakaṃ tānmātrikaṃ ca gaṇadvayaṃ janayata iti tātparyārthaḥ // SkMv_25 //
GSP31iskamatu:1301: tatra kāni buddhīndriyāṇi kāni karmendriyāṇīti? ucyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:1317: upastha ānandaṃ karoti putram utpādayatīty arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1318: evam etāḥ karmendriyāṇāṃ vṛttayo vyākhyātāḥ // SkMv_26 //
GSP31iskamatu:1320: atrāha --- mana indriyaṃ tat kiṃ lakṣaṇam iti / atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:1321: ubhayātmakam atra manaḥ saṅkalpakam indriyaṃ ca sādharmyāt /
GSP31iskamatu:1326: yathā devadatto gopālamadhye sthito gopālatvaṃ kurute mallamadhye sthito mallatvaṃ kurute /
GSP31iskamatu:1327: kasmāt? yasmād buddhīndriyāṇāṃ vṛttiṃ saṅkalpayati karmendriyāṇāṃ ca /
GSP31iskamatu:1332: yasmāt karmendriyāṇi buddhīndriyāṇi ca sāttvikād ahaṅkārād utpadyante,
GSP31iskamatu:1340: atrāha --- ekādaśendriyāṇi kena kṛtāni puruṣeṇa īśvareṇa āhosvit svabhāveneti kuta iyam āśaṅketi cet,
GSP31iskamatu:1343: tataś ca nūnaṃ cetanena puruṣeṇeśvareṇa vā svabhāveneti /
GSP31iskamatu:1345: sattvādayas trayo guṇās te yathā pariṇamanti tasmād guṇapariṇāmaviśeṣād imāny ekādaśendriyāṇi nānā /
GSP31iskamatu:1350: eteṣām eva ekādaśānām indriyāṇi grāhakāṇī bhaviṣyanti /
GSP31iskamatu:1351: (p.32) athaitan nānātvaṃ neśvareṇa na buddhyā nāhaṅkāreṇa na pradhānena na puruṣeṇa na svabhāvena kṛtam,
GSP31iskamatu:1353: yady api uktam acetanānāṃ guṇānāṃ vṛttir ayukteti /
GSP31iskamatu:1361: tasmād acetanā api guṇā ekādaśendriyabhāvena pariṇamanti /
GSP31iskamatu:1362: atrāha --- gṛhṇīmas tāvad ekādaśendriyāṇy ahaṅkārād utpannānīti /
GSP31iskamatu:1364: cakṣur uccaiḥ sanniviṣṭaṃ dūrālokane samarthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP31iskamatu:1365: śiraḥpradeśe śrotraṃ sanniviṣṭaṃ dūrāc śravaṇasamarthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP31iskamatu:1366: tvak śarīrābhyantare bahiś ca sanniviṣṭā nānāsparśagrahaṇasamarthā bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP31iskamatu:1369: evam indriyāṇāṃ nikṣepaḥ puruṣeṇa vā kṛta īśvareṇa vā svabhāvena veti /
GSP31iskamatu:1370: atrocyate --- iha sāṅkhye puruṣeśvarasvabhāvā na kāraṇam /
GSP31iskamatu:1371: kiṃ tarhi --- asminn ahaṅkāre sthitaiḥ sattvarajastamobhis tribhir guṇair nikṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1375: grāhyā ekādaśendriyārthās teṣāṃ bhedād apīndriyāṇāṃ bhedaḥ // SkMv_27 //
GSP31iskamatu:1385: na hi cakṣuḥ śravaṇasamarthaṃ dānādānasamarthaṃ vā // SkMv_28 //
GSP31iskamatu:1387: ata ūrdhvaṃ buddhyahaṅkāramanovṛttiṃ vakṣyāmaḥ / tad ucyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:1388: svālakṣaṇyā vṛttis trayasya saiṣā bhavaty asāmānyā /
GSP31iskamatu:1398: yena yena lakṣaṇenāmī lakṣyante teṣāṃ sa eva vṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1399: evaṃ yā buddhīndriyāṇāṃ na sā karmendriyāṇām /
GSP31iskamatu:1400: yā ca karmendriyāṇāṃ na sā buddhīndriyāṇām /
GSP31iskamatu:1404: saiṣā bhavaty asāmānyā asādhāraṇā evam ukte 'rthāt gamyate sāmānyāpi sādhāraṇāpi vṛttir asti /
GSP31iskamatu:1406: evam indriyāṇām asāmānyā vṛttir ākhyātā kulastrīsaṃsthānīyā /
GSP31iskamatu:1410: prāṇādyā vāyavaḥ pañceti prāṇāpānodānasamānavyānāḥ sarveṣām indriyāṇām sāmānyaṃ kurvanti /
GSP31iskamatu:1411: sa prāṇo nāma yo mukhanāsāntarago bāhye cāsya viṣaye vṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1413: asmin prāṇe yat spandanakarma tat katamena kṛtam ity atrocyate --- trayodaśavidhena karaṇena kṛtam /
GSP31iskamatu:1414: yataś caivaṃ tasmāt prāṇakarma sarvasya karaṇagrāmasya vṛttiḥ sāmānyā /
GSP31iskamatu:1415: api cātra dṛṣṭāntaḥ --- yathā kasmiṃścid rājagṛhe pañjare śukāḥ prativasanti /
GSP31iskamatu:1419: yat pañjarasya pracalanaṃ karma tat sarveṣām śukānāṃ sāmānyam /
GSP31iskamatu:1420: tadvat prāṇe yat spandanakarma tat sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ sāmānyam /
GSP31iskamatu:1423: apānabahulaś ca devadattaḥ sarpaṃ dṛṣṭvā apasarpati eṣo 'pānaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1424: tasminn apāne yat spandanakarma tat sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ sāmānyā vṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1428: aham āḍhyo 'smād āḍhyataraḥ kathaṃ syām ity eṣa udānaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1429: asminn udāne yat spandanakarma tat sāmānyā vṛttiḥ sarvendriyāṇām /
GSP31iskamatu:1430: kiñ cānyat --- hṛdyavasthānaṃ sahabhāvaś ca tena samānaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1431: yo vāyur hṛddeśe vartate sa samānaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1432: tadbahulaś ca ekākī na ramata eṣa samānaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1433: tasmin yat spandanakarma tat sarvendriyāṇāṃ sāmānyavṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1435: ānakhād ākeśāntaṃ śarīraṃ vyāpya anati calatīti vyānaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1436: vyānabahulo devadattaś ca atyantam anyena vinā ramate /
GSP31iskamatu:1437: (p.34) tasmin vyāne yat spandanakarma tat sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ sāmānyavṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1438: tad evaṃ sāmānyakāraṇavṛttiḥ prāṇādyā vāyavo vyākhyātāḥ // SkMv_29 //
GSP31iskamatu:1441: yugapac catuṣṭayasya hi vṛttiḥ kramaśaś ca tasya nirdiṣṭā /
GSP31iskamatu:1442: dṛṣṭe tathāpy adṛṣṭe trayasya tatpūrvikā vṛttiḥ // ISk_30 //
GSP31iskamatu:1443: buddhir ahaṅkāro manaś cakṣur ity etāni catvāri yugapad rūpaṃ paśyanti,
GSP31iskamatu:1445: evaṃ śabdaṃ sparśaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ catvāri yugapad gṛhṇanti /
GSP31iskamatu:1448: kramaśaś ca tasya nirdiṣṭā buddhyahaṅkāramanaścakṣuścatuṣṭayasya kramaśo vṛttir bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:1449: dvāridvāravibhāgopadeśād hrasvakālatvād vibhāgo na śakyate vaktuṃ tato yugapad ity ucyate /
GSP31iskamatu:1452: devadattaḥ panthānaṃ gacchan sthāṇuṃ paśyati tatra tasya saṃśayo bhavati kim ayaṃ sthāṇur uta puruṣa iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1453: tatra sthāṇurūpaṃ paśyati śakuniṃ ca tatrasthaṃ tato 'sya buddhir bhavati sthāṇur ayam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1454: ākuñcanaprasāraṇe karoti tato 'pi puruṣo 'yam iti pratītiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1455: evaṃ buddhyahaṅkāramanaścakṣuṣāṃ kramaśo vṛttir dṛṣṭā cakṣū rūpaṃ paśyati,
GSP31iskamatu:1467: gandhe ghrāṇapūrvikā buddhyahaṅkāramanasāṃ vṛttir iti // SkMv_30 //
GSP31iskamatu:1469: atrāha --- acetanānīndriyāṇi buddhyahaṅkārau manaś ceti kena hetunā svāṃ svāṃ vṛttiṃ pratipadyante ity atrāha ---
GSP31iskamatu:1471: puruṣārtha eva hetur na kenacit kāryate karaṇam // ISk_31 //
GSP31iskamatu:1480: yathā kila caurasenā grāmaṃ hantuṃ gacchati tatra caurasenāpatinā saṅketaḥ(p.35)
GSP31iskamatu:1481: kṛto 'sti yadāhaṃ hā heti bravīmi tadā sarvaiḥ samavāyena praveṣṭavyam /
GSP31iskamatu:1482: yadā punar aham ahā heti bravīmi tadā nirgantavyam /
GSP31iskamatu:1483: etāṃ caurasenāpater ājñām ākūtaṃ jñātvā caurāḥ praviśanti nirgacchanti ca /
GSP31iskamatu:1485: kiṃ svārthaṃ viṣayaṃ pratipadyante āhosvit parārtham ity atrocyate /
GSP31iskamatu:1487: yasmād āha --- puruṣārtha eva hetuḥ puruṣārthaḥ kartavya eva iti guṇānāṃ pravṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1488: tasmād etat trayodaśavidhaṃ karaṇaṃ puruṣārthaḥ pravartayati /
GSP31iskamatu:1489: yad apy uktam --- acetanāni karaṇāni kathaṃ pravartanta iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1490: atra brūmaḥ --- na kenacit kāryate karaṇam /
GSP31iskamatu:1493: yasmāt svayam eva ca trayodaśavidhaṃ karaṇaṃ sve sve viṣaye pravartata iti // SkMv_31 //
GSP31iskamatu:1495: atrāha --- uktaṃ ca bhagavatā na kenacit kāryate karaṇam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1498: kāryaṃ ca tasya daśadhāhāryaṃ dhāryaṃ prakāśyaṃ ca // ISk_32 //
GSP31iskamatu:1499: yad atra karaṇam ity uktaṃ tat trayodaśavidham iti boddhyam /
GSP31iskamatu:1502: buddhyahaṅkārau mana iti etat trayodaśavidhaṃ karaṇam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1503: atrāha --- āhārakaṃ dhārakaṃ prakāśakaṃ ca tad iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1507: atrāha --- kiṃ tad asti yasyāharaṇaṃ dhāraṇaṃ prakāśanaṃ ca kriyate /
GSP31iskamatu:1508: atrocyate --- kāryaṃ ca tasya daśadhāhāryaṃ dhāryaṃ prakāśyaṃ ca /
GSP31iskamatu:1511: ete daśa viṣayāḥ kāryam ity ucyate /
GSP31iskamatu:1512: taṃ daśavidhaṃ viṣayaṃ buddhīndriyaiḥ prakāśitam arthaṃ karmendriyāṇy āharanti dhārayanti ca /
GSP31iskamatu:1513: tad yathā tamasi sthitaṃ pradīpena prakāśitaṃ ghaṭaṃ hasta ādatte dhārayati ca /
GSP31iskamatu:1514: tad evaṃ yathā ghaṭaṃ tathā śeṣāṇy api // SkMv_32 //
GSP31iskamatu:1516: antaḥkaraṇaṃ trividhaṃ daśadhā bāhyaṃ trayasya viṣayākhyam /
GSP31iskamatu:1517: sāmpratakālaṃ bāhyaṃ trikālam ābhyantaraṃ karaṇam // ISk_33 //
GSP31iskamatu:1522: trayasya viṣayākhyaṃ buddhyahaṅkāramanasāṃ trayāṇām antaḥkaraṇānāṃ bāhyaṃ daśavidhaṃ(p.36)
GSP31iskamatu:1525: ābhyantaraṃ trikaṃ svāmibhūtaṃ bāhyaṃ daśavidhaṃ bhṛtyabhūtam ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1527: yad etad bāhyaṃ daśavidhaṃ karaṇam uktaṃ tat sāmpratakālaṃ vartamānaviṣayagrāhakaṃ bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:1530: evaṃ vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthāni vartamāneṣu vacanādeyabhūmimalotsargānandeṣu pravartante nātītābhaviṣyatoḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1531: kiñ cānyat --- trikālam ābhyantaraṃ mano'haṅkārabuddhirūpaṃ karaṇaṃ pravartate /
GSP31iskamatu:1532: buddhir vartamānaṃ ghaṭaṃ buddhyate atītaṃ bhaviṣyantaṃ ca smarati /
GSP31iskamatu:1533: tad yathā --- yudhiṣṭhirabhīmasenāv āstām atītaviṣayagrāhiṇī buddhiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1538: evaṃ mano 'py atītaṃ saṅkalpayati vartamānaṃ bhāvi ca /
GSP31iskamatu:1539: yata evaṃ tasmād ucyate “trikālam ābhyantaraṃ karaṇam” iti // SkMv_33 //
GSP31iskamatu:1541: atrāha --- kāni indriyāṇi saviśeṣaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛhṇanti,
GSP31iskamatu:1544: vāg bhavati śabdaviṣayā śeṣāny api pañcaviṣayāṇi // ISk_34 //
GSP31iskamatu:1545: teṣām karaṇānāṃ madhye yeṣām ayam adhikāro vartate teṣāṃ yāni buddhīndriyāṇi śrotratvakcakṣurjihvāghrāṇāni pañca tāni saviśeṣaṃ gṛhṇanti aviśeṣam api viṣayaṃ gṛhṇanti /
GSP31iskamatu:1546: atrāha --- kasya saviśeṣaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛhṇanti kasya nirviśeṣam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1547: atrocyate śabdasparśarasarūpagandhāḥ pajña devānāṃ tanmātrasaṃjñitā nirviśeṣāḥ kevalasukhalakṣaṇatvāt /
GSP31iskamatu:1548: yasmāt tatra duḥkhamohau na stas tasmān nirviśeṣās te iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1550: viśiṣyante śāntaghoramūḍhatvādineti viśeṣās taiḥ saha saviśeṣāḥ,
GSP31iskamatu:1552: evaṃ śabdādayo manuṣyāṇāṃ saviśeṣāḥ sukhaduḥkhamohayuktā ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1553: devānāṃ tu buddhīndriyāṇi nirviśeṣaṃ sukhātmakaṃ prakāśayanti /
GSP31iskamatu:1556: vāg bhavati śabdaviṣayā śeṣāny api pañca viṣayāṇi /
GSP31iskamatu:1557: tatra devānāṃ vāk pādaṃ pādārdhaṃ ślokam uccārayati /
GSP31iskamatu:1559: ato devānām asmākaṃ ca vāgindriyaṃ tulyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1560: kiṃ cānyat --- śeṣāṇy api pañca viṣayāṇi iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1563: evaṃ pañcalakṣaṇam eva pāṇīndriyaṃ sannikṛṣṭaṃ pañcalakṣaṇaṃ ghaṭaṃ gṛhṇāti /
GSP31iskamatu:1565: evaṃ śabdādipañcalakṣaṇaḥ pādaḥ pañcātmikāyām eva bhuvi viharati /
GSP31iskamatu:1566: evaṃ pañcalakṣaṇe pāyūpasthe api pañcalakṣaṇāv utsargānandau kurutaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1567: tasmāt yuktam abhihitam --- “śeṣāṇy api pañca viṣayāṇi” iti // SkMv_34 //
GSP31iskamatu:1570: sāntaḥkaraṇā buddhiḥ sarvaṃ viṣayam avagāhate yasmāt /
GSP31iskamatu:1571: tasmāt trividhaṃ karaṇaṃ dvāri dvārāṇi śeṣāṇi // ISk_35 //
GSP31iskamatu:1572: sāntaḥkaraṇā antaḥkaraṇe ahaṃmanasī tābhyāṃ saha vartate yā buddhiḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP31iskamatu:1573_0: sā buddhiḥ sarvaṃ viṣayaṃ niravaśeṣaṃ triṣv api kāleṣu yasmād avagāhate vyāpnoti
GSP31iskamatu:1573_1: gṛhṇāti śabdādyaṃ pañcavidhaṃ tasmād eva tanmanobuddhyahaṅkāralakṣaṇaṃ trividham
GSP31iskamatu:1575_0: śeṣāṇi punaḥ dvāri bāhye yāni buddhikarmendriyatayā pratītāni śrotravākprabhṛtīni
GSP31iskamatu:1575_1: daśa tāni tasyā eva mano'haṅkārayuktāyā buddher viṣayagrahaṇāya dvārāṇi pratīkāny
GSP31iskamatu:1576: tathā etair daśabhir dvāraiḥ sāntaḥkaraṇā buddhir eva viṣayān gṛhṇātīti trividham eva karaṇam ity arthaḥ // SkMv_35 //
GSP31iskamatu:1580: kṛtsnaṃ puruṣasyārthaṃ prakāśya buddhau prayacchanti // ISk_36 //

GSP31iskamatu:2344: yat tat sargādau sūkṣmaṃ śarīraṃ tānmātrikaṃ prāg uktaṃ trayodaśavidhena karaṇena saṃyuktaṃ trividhena bandhena baddhaṃ saṃsarati /
GSP31iskamatu:2345: sa ca bandhas trividhaḥ pūrvam ākhyātaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2346: tad eva sūkṣmaśarīram utpanne jñāne tridhā bandhān mucyate /
GSP31iskamatu:2347: tasmān mucyate badhyate saṃsarati nānāśrayā prakṛtiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2349: evaṃ yat pradhānaṃ tat sūkṣmaṃ śarīraṃ tat pradhānaṃ prakṛtir ity anarthāntaram /
GSP31iskamatu:2350: tatra yaḥ puṃso bandhamokṣasaṃsaraṇāni brūte sa mūḍhaḥ // SkMv_62 //
GSP31iskamatu:2352: atrāha --- sā prakṛtiḥ kair guṇair ātmānaṃ bandhayati,
GSP31iskamatu:2354: rūpaiḥ saptabhir evaṃ badhnāty ātmānam ātmanā prakṛtiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2355: saiva ca puruṣasyārthaṃ prati vimocayaty ekarūpeṇa // ISk_63 //
GSP31iskamatu:2356: saptabhī rūpair iyam evaṃ prakṛtir dharmādibhir vinā jñānam ātmanātmānaṃ badhnāti /
GSP31iskamatu:2362: evaṃ tattvābhyāsān nāsmi na me nāham ity apariśeṣam /
GSP31iskamatu:2363: aviparyayād viśuddhaṃ kevalam utpadyate jñānam // ISk_64 //
GSP31iskamatu:2365: etāni pañcaviṃśatitattvāni puruṣādyāni bhūtaparyantāni teṣām abhyāsas tattvābhyāsaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2376: viparyayaḥ saṃśayas tadviparīto 'viparyayas tasmād aviparyayād asaṃśayād yathābhūtārthadarśanād viśuddham niravadyam avyāmiśraṃ kevalaṃ jñānam utpadyate prādurbhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:2377: kiṃ jñānam? guṇapuruṣāntaropalabdhirūpam ity arthaḥ // SkMv_64 //
GSP31iskamatu:2379: atrāha --- tena jñānena puruṣaḥ kiṃ karoti / atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:2381: prakṛtiṃ paśyati puruṣaḥ prekṣakavad avasthitaḥ svasthaḥ // ISk_65 //
GSP31iskamatu:2382: yathā kaścit prekṣako raṅgasthito gītavāditranṛtyādibhir vartamānāṃ nartakīṃ svastho nirvikalpaḥ paśyati /
GSP31iskamatu:2383: evaṃ puruṣa ātmakṛtena jñānena tāsu tāsv avasthāsu vartamānāṃ prakṛtiṃ paśyati --- iyaṃ sā prakṛtir yā sarvapurāṇam ātmānaṃ badhnāti /
GSP31iskamatu:2384: prekṣakavat prekṣakeṇa tulyaḥ svasthaḥ svasmin bhāve sthitaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2389: nirvarttitobhayapuruṣaprayojanavaśād yaiḥ saptabhī rūpair dharmādibhir ātmānaṃ badhnāti tebhyo rūpebhyo vinivṛttām /
GSP31iskamatu:2390: yāvaj jñānacakṣuṣā dṛṣṭā prakṛtiḥ puruṣeṇa tathā ca pumān dṛṣṭaḥ // SkMv_65 //
GSP31iskamatu:2392: atrāha --- jñānacakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā prakṛtiṃ puruṣaḥ kiṃ karoti? atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:2393: dṛṣṭā mayety upekṣaka eko dṛṣṭāham ity uparatānyā /
GSP31iskamatu:2395: sati saṃyoge 'pi tayoḥ prayojanaṃ nāsti sargasya // ISk_66 //
GSP31iskamatu:2396: yathemāṃ raṅgagatāṃ nartakīṃ sarvāsv avasthāsu vartamānāṃ dṛṣṭvā viramati raṅgāt prekṣakaḥ dṛṣṭā mayety upekṣaka ekaḥ kevalaḥ śuddhaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2397: tathā prakṛtir api --- “anenāhaṃ dṛṣṭā” iti nivṛttā /
GSP31iskamatu:2398: ekā trailokyasyāpi pradhānakāraṇabhūtā na dvitīyā prakṛtir asti /
GSP31iskamatu:2399: nartaky api --- “aham anena dṛṣṭā” ity uparamate nṛtyāt,
GSP31iskamatu:2400: evaṃ puruṣo 'pi “dṛṣṭā mayeyaṃ jñānacakṣuṣā prakṛtiḥ” iti prekṣakavad uparamate mokṣaṃ gacchatīty arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2401: tathā prakṛtir api dṛṣṭāham aneneti svavyāpārād uparamaty eva /
GSP31iskamatu:2402: atrāha --- puṃprakṛtyoḥ sarvagatatvāt sarvaniṣedho na śakyate vaktum /
GSP31iskamatu:2404: tat katham idaṃ sādhanaṃ samīcīnam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:2405: atrocyate --- sati saṃyoge 'pi tayoḥ prayojanaṃ nāsti sargasyeti /
GSP31iskamatu:2406: yady api pradhānapuruṣayoḥ sarvagatayoḥ saṃyogo bhavaty eva /
GSP31iskamatu:2407: tasmiṃś ca sati sargasambhavas tathāpi nāsau sargaḥ syāt prayojanābhāvāt /
GSP31iskamatu:2414_0: evaṃ prakṛtipuruṣayos tayoḥ śarīrotpattir nāsti punaḥ ṛṇikadhāriṇakavad yatheha loke
GSP31iskamatu:2414_1: ṛṇikadhāriṇakau uttamādhamarṇau devadattayajñadattau yo 'smin ṛṇaṃ dhārayati sa uttamarṇas
GSP31iskamatu:2416: tatas tau kṛtaprayojanau parasparam arthena santyaktāv atha tayor bhūyaḥ saṃyogo bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:2418: yathā vā vṛddhasaṃyogād apatyaṃ na bhavati,
GSP31iskamatu:2420: tathā pradhānapuruṣayoḥ kṛtaprayojanayoḥ prayojanaṃ nāstīti siddham // SkMv_66 //
GSP31iskamatu:2422: kiñ cānyat, yadi puruṣasyotpanne jñāne mokṣas tarhi mama kasmān na bhavati / ata ucyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:2425: yadā puruṣeṇa pañcaviṃśatitattvajñānam adhigataṃ bhavati tadā dharmādīny akāraṇāni prāptāni punarjanmasamarthāni na bhavanti /
GSP31iskamatu:2427: loke bījāny agnidagdhāni na prarohasamarthāni bhavanti /
GSP31iskamatu:2428: dharmo yeṣām ādis tāni dharmādīni teṣām akāraṇānāṃ prāptir akāraṇaprāptiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2430: atrāha --- yadi samyagjñānān mokṣo bhavati tatrācāryasyopadeṣṭuḥ samyagjñānam utpannaṃ kimarthaṃ mokṣaṃ na gato 'sti,
GSP31iskamatu:2431: atha vā tvatprasādāt tajjñānaṃ mamāpi sañjātaṃ kim ahaṃ mokṣaṃ na gacchāmi /
GSP31iskamatu:2433: saṃskāro nāma dharmādharmau nimittaṃ kṛtvā śarīrotpattir bhavati tiryaṅmanuṣyadevādiṣu /
GSP31iskamatu:2435: sa ca saṃskāraḥ phalam adattvā kṣayaṃ na gacchati,
GSP31iskamatu:2436: utpannajñānasyāpi tasmād idaṃ śarīraṃ vināśaṃ yāsyati /
GSP31iskamatu:2439: tasmāt hetor utpannajñānasyāpi dharmādharmavaśāt tiṣṭhati śarīram /
GSP31iskamatu:2442: yathā kulālaś cakraṃ bhramayati ghaṭaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
GSP31iskamatu:2443: sa kulālo ghaṭaṃ kṛtvā yathā svastho bhavati,
GSP31iskamatu:2447: evam eva pūrvakṛtayor dharmādharmayor balavattvād durbalatvāj jñānasya,
GSP31iskamatu:2448: utpanne 'pi jñāne vidvāṃs tiṣṭhati saṃskāravaśāc cakrabhramavad dhṛtaśarīraḥ // SkMv_67 //
GSP31iskamatu:2450: atrāha --- utpannajñānaḥ phalanirapekṣaṃ karma nirbījaṃ kurvan na deham ārabhate,
GSP31iskamatu:2451: ārabdhaphalaṃ yāvat janmadāyi “nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate karma” “avaśyam eva bhoktavyaṃ kṛtam” iti kṣapayan,
GSP31iskamatu:2455: utpanne jñāne 'pi kadā vidvān mokṣaṃ gacchatīti? atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:2457: aikāntikam ātyantikam ubhayaṃ kaivalyam āpnoti // ISk_68 //
GSP31iskamatu:2458: tad evaṃ sati śarīrabhede dehanāśe prāpta āyāta ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2464: yadā pūrvakṛtayor dharmādharmayoḥ kṣayo bhavati tadā śarīraṃ bhidyate /
GSP31iskamatu:2465: tasmiṃś ca śarīre bhinne pūrvoktena jñānena śarīraṃ pradhānākhyaṃ kāraṇam aviśeṣamayaṃ tānmātrikaṃ sargādāv utpannaṃ tan nivartate /
GSP31iskamatu:2466: iha śarīre yat pārthivaṃ tat prthivīṃ praviśati /
GSP31iskamatu:2471: evam ayaṃ vidvān tasmin śarīre bhinne --- aikāntikam ātyantikam ubhayaṃ kaivalyam āpnoti /
GSP31iskamatu:2472: aikāntikam avaśyambhāvitvād ātyantikam apunarāvṛttitvāt sarvathety arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2474: na ca nivṛtte roge punaḥ sambhaved ity ubhayodāharaṇam aikāntikātyantikayoḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2475: ittham ekāntātyantas tāpatrayasyābhāvād uparamād anutpatteḥ kaivalyaṃ mokṣa ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2478: atrāha --- kiṃprayojanam idaṃ jñānam ucyate / atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:2481: yaś cāsau puruṣārtho mokṣas tadarthaṃ puruṣavimokṣārthaṃ jñānam idam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:2482: yad etat pūrvavarṇitaṃ jñānaṃ etad guhyaṃ durvijñeyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2483: paramarṣiṇā kapilena samākhyātaṃ kathitam ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2485: atrocyate --- sthityutpattipralayāḥ tatra devādīnām aṣṭau sthānāni bhavanti /
GSP31iskamatu:2500: atrāha --- yad etad bhagavatā vyākhyātaṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvajñānam,
GSP31iskamatu:2502: etat pavitryam agryaṃ munir āsuraye 'nukampayā pradadau /
GSP31iskamatu:2503: āsurir api pañcaśikhāya tena ca bahulīkṛtaṃ tantram // ISk_70 //
GSP31iskamatu:2508: yasmān narakapretatiryagyoniṣu patanāt trāyate tasmāt pavitram /
GSP31iskamatu:2510: vedapurāṇabhāratam anvādibhyo 'pi dharmaśāstrebhya etat pañcaviṃśatitattvajñānam uttamam /
GSP31iskamatu:2514: munir bhagavān kapilaḥ āsurisagotrāya brāhmaṇāya varṣasahasrayājine 'dhikāritām avagamya (asmai) pradadau /
GSP31iskamatu:2516: andhe tamasy ajñāne 'yaṃ tapasvī vartata ity utpannayānukampayā /
GSP31iskamatu:2518: bhagavān bhūtānāṃ gatim āgatiṃ ca vidann anati calatīti bhagavān kapilaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2520: tad eva jñānaṃ bhūya āsurisagotro 'nukampayā pañcaśikhāya provāca /
GSP31iskamatu:2530: ṣaṣṭipadārthā yasmin śāstre tantryante tat ṣaṣṭitantram /
GSP31iskamatu:2532: tena īśvarakṛṣṇena vistaragranthagrahaṇabhīruṇā hitārthaṃ ṣaṣṭitantram atisaṅkṣiptam / tad āha ---
GSP31iskamatu:2534: saṅkṣiptam āryamatinā samyag vijñāya siddhāntam // ISk_71 //
GSP31iskamatu:2540: tad eva ṣaṣṭitantram āryābhiḥ saṅkṣiptam āryamatinā vistīrṇamatinā samyag vijñāya siddhāntam kāryakāraṇasiddhasya śarīrasyānto 'punarbhāvo mokṣas tasya tādātmyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2541: tatisiddhasya śarīrasya sūkṣmasya tānmātrikasya sargādibhavasyānto mūrtināśa iti vā /
GSP31iskamatu:2544: saptatyāṃ kila yo 'rthās te 'rthāḥ kṛtsnasya ṣaṣṭitantrasya /
GSP31iskamatu:2547: ye ṣaṣṭitantre padārthā abhihitās te saptatyāṃ vyākhyātāḥ kathitāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2549: “bhedas tamaso 'ṣṭavidha” iti āryāyāṃ “pañca viparyayabhedā” ity atra cābhihitā ity ete pañcāśat pratyayāḥ ime cānye daśa maulikāḥ / tathā hi ---
GSP31iskamatu:2550: astitvam ekatvam athārthavattvaṃ pārārthyam anyatvam atho nivṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2551: yogo viyogo bahavaḥ pumāṃsaḥ sthitiḥ śarīrasya ca śeṣavṛttiḥ //
GSP31iskamatu:2552: tatra “bhedānāṃ parimāṇāt” ity etaiḥ pañcabhir hetubhiḥ pradhānāstitvam ekatvam arthavattvaṃ ca siddham /
GSP31iskamatu:2558: navadhā tuṣṭiḥ aṣṭadhā siddhir iti pañcāśat /
GSP31iskamatu:2563: pareṇa saha vādaḥ paravādaḥ tena varjitāś ca /
GSP31iskamatu:2566: atrāha --- katham etad alpagranthaṃ śāstraṃ kṛtsnasya vācakaṃ bhaviṣyati? atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:2567: tasmāt samāsadṛṣṭaṃ śāstram idaṃ nārthataś ca parihīnam /
GSP31iskamatu:2568: tantrasya ca bṛhanmūrter darpaṇasaṅkrāntam iva bimbam // ISk_73 //
GSP31iskamatu:2574: kartā bhoktā bhojyaṃ mokṣaś cātra cintyate /
GSP31iskamatu:2581: yathā svalpe 'pi darpaṇe mahato rūpasya nirūpaṇaṃ syāt /
GSP31iskamatu:2582: evam alpaśāstre ṣaṣṭitantrasya kṛtsnasyāpi vyaktir abhihitety arthaḥ // SkMv_73 //
GSP31iskamatu:2583: ity ācāryeśvarakṛṣṇaproktāyāḥ sāṅkhyasaptatyā vṛttir ācāryamāṭharakṛtiḥ samāptā /
